app.title: Atomic Range Prediction
app.subtitle: Interactive Simulation of Nuclear Bomb Impact with Global Map

header.step1: Select bomb type from dropdown above
header.step2: Search location or click directly on map
header.step3: View animation and impact prediction data
header.step4: Enable Comparison Mode to compare 2 bombs

tutorial.welcomeDesc: Welcome to Atomic Range Prediction - interactive simulator to learn about atomic bomb impact. Let me show you how to use it!
tutorial.bombSelectorDesc: Choose bomb type from this dropdown. Available types from Little Boy (15kt) to Tsar Bomba (50,000kt)!
tutorial.comparisonModeDesc: Enable Comparison Mode to compare 2 bombs side-by-side. See the difference clearly!
tutorial.locationSearchDesc: Use search box to find cities or countries. Map will zoom automatically to selected location!
tutorial.interactiveMapDesc: Click on any country on the map to start simulation. Blast zone animations will appear with 6 different colored zones!
tutorial.exportMenuDesc: Export simulation results as PNG, PDF, JSON, or CSV. Or share via link for collaboration!
tutorial.blastInfoDesc: After clicking map, this panel displays impact details per zone, casualty estimates based on real population density, and complete breakdown.
tutorial.historyDesc: All your simulations are saved here (max 10 latest). Click to view details or delete if not needed.
tutorial.readyDesc:
You're ready to use the app!

Start by selecting a bomb, then click a country on the map. This tutorial can be repeated anytime by clicking the Help button (❓) in the header.

history.title: Simulation History
history.emptyDesc: Click on the map to start a simulation

footer.disclaimer: ⚠️ This simulation data is for educational purposes only. The formulas used are simple approximations and not actual military calculations.
